name: Flix the Flea
summary:
Flix is a flea who lives on a Dog, who in turn lives on a space-exploring rocket-ship. While exploring a new planetoid, Flix takes an unfortunate nosedive into a chasm. It's your mission to guide Flix up and out of monster infested caves in the hopes of getting him back to his rocket-ship and the sanctuary of his cozy doggie home.

Highly inspired by the wonderful 8-bit classic "La Pulga" (AKA: Bugaboo), Flix The Flea returns to an almost forgotten sub-genre of cutesome flea-based platform games, with a host of fresh environments and features, creating just the right balance of fun and frustration for a very entertaining & addictive gaming experience!
